title: Blog CMS
description: I made a CMS for a Blog using Nuxt 3 on the frontend and Node JS on the backend. The Project was focused on creating a tool to manage the content of a simple blog, it has categories for the posts, comments and all the necessary things to run a blog!

title: Project 02
description: A Complete marketplace that works as a single transaction per item, it has users, wallet system, products, categories and everything necessary to work as a marketplace. The project was focused on creating a marketplace and was used Nuxt 3 on the front end and Node JS on the backend. Currently I'm refactoring this project and applying the Test Driven Development system.
